original_name: God afton, Herr Wallenberg - En Passionshistoria från verkligheten
plot: Swedish national Raoul Wallenberg, newcomer to politics and international machinations, travels to German-occupied Budapest during WWII in order to effectively intervene in the fate of trapped Hungarian Jews, by providing them with safe passage to Sweden. Based on a true story.   Written by  Eileen Berdon
plot_en: Swedish national Raoul Wallenberg, newcomer to politics and international machinations, travels to German-occupied Budapest during WWII in order to effectively intervene in the fate of trapped Hungarian Jews, by providing them with safe passage to Sweden. Based on a true story.   Written by  Eileen Berdon

title: Wallenberg: Historia de un héroe
